snippet: An influential former cabinet minister said Monday that Britain should threaten to quit the European Union if Prime Minister David Cameron cannot negotiate looser ties.
abstract: Liam Fox, former British defense secretary, says that Britain should threaten to leave European Union if it cannot negotiate much looser ties; statement underlines growing pressure from members of Prime Min David Cameron's Conservative Party for more arms-length relationship with euro zone allies.
lead_paragraph: An influential former cabinet minister said Monday that Britain should threaten to quit the European Union if Prime Minister David Cameron cannot negotiate looser ties.

headline.main: Euro-Skeptics Turn Up Heat on Cameron
